Class TeachReachPopulater

java.lang.Object
  uk.ac.reading.dp005570.TeachReach.util.TeachReachPopulater

public class TeachReachPopulater
extends java.lang.Object

Controller for populating the database and providing information to views for proper population. Cursor traversal etc.

Author:
Ian Field
